item.title: [Pi] Quest Tab [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, for my quest tab, do you know how it says Free Quests? I changed it to Special Quests and it’s placement code is 663 see.

 public static void questTab(TextDrawingArea[] tda) {
    RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(638);
    RSInterface list = addTabInterface(16025);
    addText(640, "Quest Diary", tda, 2, 0xff9b00, false, true);
    addText(663, "Special Quests", tda, 2, 0xff9900, false, true);
	addText(665, "Special Events", tda, 2, 0xff9900, false, true);

But whenever I added Special Events, I wasn’t sure what the placement code was so I just put 665 in and it didn’t show up, does anybody know how I can get it to the correct place I want it?

Read full topic
